text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 9.02646px; white-space: pre;

svg.text: 膽痰膿血汗脂肪​淚膏唾涕關節尿

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 24px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 9.02646px; white-space: pre;

svg.text: 地水火風四大種​眼耳鼻舌身淨色​顏聲香味觸無水​男女根色命心食​空身語表快柔適​積集相續老無常​

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 9.02646px; white-space: pre;

svg.text: 髮毛爪齒皮​肉腱骨髓腎​心肝膜脾肺​腸膜胃糞腦​

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 24px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre;

svg.text: 5 性+業生色命根+心色+食素

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre;

svg.text: 硬粗重軟滑輕,流動黏結​熱冷,支持推動

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre;
fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre;
